author: By JULIE CARR SMYTH and KEN MILLER Associated Press
title: Ohio, Oklahoma courts rule abortions can continue amid virus
description: COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) — Court decisions in two U.S. states Monday allowed abortions to continue after the procedure was caught in the crosshairs of governors' orders suspending all non-essential elective surgeries due to the new coronavirus.
content:
